resources.string: Try to lock min & max cpu frequencies. Choosing set on boot, min & max frequencies will apply auto when device reboot. Also try to create cpu profiles with your favorite frequencies.
Choose your favorite governor. Try to find best governor for cpu and let it to jump between min & max frequencies. Use set on boot in order to reboot with your favorite governor.

Choose an I/O scheduler. They have many purposes depending on the goal of the I/O scheduler. Try to minimize time wasted by hard disk seeks, to give a share of the disk bandwidth to each running process and more.
The bigger the read-ahead buffer is, the better the SD card can predict what command would come next. This gives you better performance, and a potential increase of battery life.
Choose the voltage for every available frequency. Set on boot option doesn\'t available for safety reasons.
Enabling this feature will disable access to phone storage, it is going to charge faster when phone is pluged in to usb.
This feature group tasks into the least cores possible. Also increase battery life. Set 0 for disable to 2 for the most aggressive.
This feature is for Qualcomm cpu. When enabled, cpu/gpu frequency modification is not guaranteed and might override frequency settings. Mpdecision is a proprietary code and doesn\'t recommended.
